DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the percentage of tumor necrosis present in the patient's cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the localized death of living cells associated with presence of tumor composed of atypical neoplastic cells.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tumor composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues.  Malignant neoplasms usually metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision.  The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas (adenocarcinomas or squamous cell carcinomas), Hodgkin's and non-Hodgkin's lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas. -- 2004

Concepts.definition: A neoplasm composed of atypical neoplastic, often pleomorphic cells that invade other tissues. Malignant neoplasms often metastasize to distant anatomic sites and may recur after excision. The most common malignant neoplasms are carcinomas, Hodgkin and non-Hodgkin lymphomas, leukemias, melanomas, and sarcomas.

Property.preferredDefinition: Necrosis; the localized death of living cells as from infection or the interruption of blood supply; unprogrammed death of living tissue.

Concepts.definition: A cell death process that is morphologically characterized by a gain in cell volume (oncosis), swelling of organelles, plasma membrane rupture and subsequent loss of intracellular contents.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 3/22/22 jk added "Qualified" RS as part of MCL quarterly content review. ---- updated/revised to provide naming consistency for related elements using EVS terms

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed that is a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/23/18 jk chg reg status to Standard as part of RECIST FG content; reused by 30 CDEs and multiple SOs. 10-19-2018 TMT received permission from BC to transfer ownership from NIDCR to NCI Standards.
